img_above_text:
Venom Daoist (Webbed Hollow)
With everything cleared on the top floor of the Webbed Hollow, it's time to make your way down.
img_below_text:
Head back to the Pool of Shattered Jade Shrine, and look back to the path where the Scorpion Prince was to spot a large wooden scaffold bridge. Be sure to check around the left side first for a green Wisp, then cross the two-tiered bridge to drop down a level.
![Wukong UpperHollow 45.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/16/Wukong_UpperHollow_45.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:

With everything cleared on the top floor of the Webbed Hollow, it's time to make your way down."
            - Following Text: "Head back to the Pool of Shattered Jade Shrine, and look back to the path where the Scorpion Prince was to spot a large wooden scaffold bridge. Be sure to check around the left side first for a green Wisp, then cross the two-tiered bridge to drop down a level.
![Wukong UpperHollow 45.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/16/Wukong_UpperHollow_45.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts the protagonist in the game "Black Myth: Wukong" standing on a rocky ledge within the Webbed Hollow area. The scene showcases a dimly lit cavern with wooden scaffolding bridges and hanging lanterns, suggesting a descent to a lower level. The character is equipped with an "Evil Repelling Medicament" and appears to be preparing to navigate the treacherous environment. The image serves to illustrate the player's next steps in the walkthrough, highlighting the path towards the Pool of Shattered Jade Shrine and the presence of a green Wisp to be collected before crossing the bridge.
